title: Typophile Film Fest 4, St Petersburg
content:
Submitted by [Joe Pemberton](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.typophile.com/user/1160 "View user profile.") : 21.Aug.2008 11.30pm 

[Punchcut](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.punchcut.com/) presents the **Typophile Film Fest 4 at ATypI ’08 St. Petersburg**. The Film Fest is an unequaled selection of short typographic films hailing from designers in Portugal, The Netherlands, Austria, Canada and the US. The films are a mashup of motion design, typographic animation and short stories including broadcast motion design, documentaries and typographic eye candy from Trollbäck + Company, Strange Attractors, Heebok Lee, Nick Shinn, Juan Leguizamon as well as exclusive interviews and cuts from the acclaimed documentary film _Helvetica_.

**THANK YOU FONTSHOP**

Typophile owes its sincere gratitude to **[FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.fontshop.com/)** for making this presentation at ATypI possible. Thanks also to [ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.atypi.org/) for including the Film Fest in the 2008 conference programme.

/////

**DETAILS**

_ATypI ’08 St Petersburg_

Screening: 5:20-6:20pm  
Date: Friday 19 September, 2008

Beloselsky-Belozersky Palace  
Nevsky Prospekt 41  
Russian Federation

Admission: Free to ATypI attendees

/////

**ABOUT ATypI**  
ATypI, Association Typographique Internationale, is a global forum and focal point for the type community and business. ATypI’s annual conference draws hundreds of worldwide participants. // [http://www.atypi.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.atypi.org/)

**ABOUT TYPOPHILE**  
Typophile is an international collaborative community of graphic designers, typographers and type designers. Typophile is driven by sharing and the idea that we’re always learning. Now in its eighth year, it is one of the oldest design communities online. Typophile is a Punchcut brand. // [http://www.typophile.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.typophile.com/)

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fontshop_logo_60_v2_6395.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.fontshop.com/)  
**ABOUT FONTSHOP**  
Erik Spiekermann, Joan Spiekermann, and Neville Brody founded FSI FontShop International in 1990 in Berlin, Germany. FontShop is the original independent font retailer, carrying over 100,000 fonts from more than 50 international type foundries, including FontFont, FSI’s own boutique label of innovative fonts for designers. // [http://www.fontshop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.fontshop.com/)

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/punchcut_lovo_60_v2_5539.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.punchcut.com/)  
**ABOUT PUNCHCUT**  
Punchcut is a US-based user interface design and development company that specializes in improving device user experiences. Punchcut works with device manufacturers, operators and leading entertainment brands to design for people in motion. // [http://www.punchcut.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122114801/http:/www.punchcut.com/)
author: Joe Pemberton
